title: Riot matchmaking needs to be fixed.
body:
JasonWazza Nblue: hey el chapo and dog is blind, what did you have for first/secondary?
my dog is blind : mid/bot
El Chapo VIP: fill/support
my dog is blind : :^) xdddd
Yasei Doubutsu HlpMe: 3 of us got auto filled
JasonWazza Nblue: and i had jungle mid
my dog is blind : rofl
JasonWazza Nblue: woo rito
my dog is blind : promos tho
JasonWazza Nblue: but i had to take support over someone with support XD
JasonWazza Nblue: rito match making

This is a chat log, Tl:DR;
I got autofilled from Jungle/mid to support
Yasei got filled (he had picked fill)
Jungler had choosen Fill/Support.

BUT i got filled to support, when the jungler had fill/support and should have taken support instead of me.

Riot you need to fix your matchmaking from whatever it is, because it's automatically filling in the wrong cases.

replies.body:
i know it's a new season but why does rito's matchmaking have to be so unreliable, did they not just add the new permanent autofill system to make it easy for everyone, when in reality it's just a robot that randomises where everyone's roles are.


P.s I also hate how when I'm playing in ranked I get a full team of bronze players then they get a few diamonds and plats but this has been everyone's problem since the start of the season

Dude, its still better than it was, and its a team game. TALK TO YOUR TEAM AND ASK FOR THE ROLE YOU WANT. If you dont get it, suck it up princess. I said EVEN IF IT IS 1/10 which I would like to see some kind of proof that it is ANYWHERE close to that, its still better than pick order.

Once again, it is still better than pick order. 

If you dont get that then you should go back to playing with lego mate.

I think that this is just a statistical anomaly. I put mid/ top and I get my chosen role at least 4/5 games.

Do you not remember how it was before they brought in this new system? It was pick order, so much more random depending on where u get placed in the order. The odd mistake in its decisions is FAR preferable to the old system. 

Now if they could just hurry up and implement it for normals too. Oh and increase the bans already...135 champs now riot. We need one ban per person.

Nope, watch streamers and you will find they have found a couple of instances of it already.

Dyrus apparently ran into it a few times (according to one of my friends.)

And Spazie has a video with it blatantly in it.

https://youtu.be/h2HYYBKnrwE?t=4m3s

A couple of instances. From people that play like 15 games per day every day. You are only proving my point that it is not common and have not at all addressed the point that even if it got it wrong 1/10 it would still be better than the old system.

Your argument that it fucking people around 10% of the time is ok, is just terrible.

1/10 isn't a statistical anomaly, and the fact is it's an AUTOMATED PROGRAM that can't sort players properly, meaning it is likely happening more often, but people just aren't asking to check about it.
